title: Talking Points
text:
The Child Poverty Rate in the City of Dallas in 2021 is 23.8%
According to estimates from the American Community Survey for 2021, there are now -22,308 fewer children in poverty within the City of Dallas than there were in 2017.

title: Talking Points
text:
According to estimates from the American Community Survey for 2022, there are now -25,768 fewer children in poverty within the City of Dallas than there were in 2017.
This poverty rate for all data included in this report is calculated from the 3 year average of 1-year American Community Survey Estimates unless specified as otherwise.

title: Talking Points
section: Compared to large neighboring Texas cities, the City Dallas has the fourth highest Child Poverty Rate in 2022 in Texas.
text: Compared to large neighboring Texas cities, the City Dallas has the fourth highest Child Poverty Rate in 2022 in Texas.
